title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 27 August 2013 - XWiki
content:
<chalx> has joined #xwiki  
00:35 <chalx> has quit  
00:59 <kstuart> has quit  
03:49 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
06:33 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
08:27 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
08:58 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
09:09 <sburjan> has joined #xwiki  
09:37 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:37 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
09:47 <polx> has quit  
09:56 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
09:59 <sburjan> vmassol: good morning !  
10:00 <vmassol> good morning  
10:00 <sburjan> I have tried to reproduce the issue you told me yesterday, and I wasn't able to do so. It seems that my AS gets cleaned correctly  
10:00 <sburjan> I will reply to the list, so cyou can see what I did  
10:01 <vmassol> ok thanks, he also mentions some extension on exo did you check that?  
10:01 <sburjan> nope  
10:02 <sburjan> but the scheduler plugin comes bundled by default afaik, I don't understand what is the user talking about  
10:03 <sburjan> http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Scheduler+Plugin  
10:03 <sburjan> replying to thread  
10:03 <vmassol> ok  
10:09 <polx> has quit  
10:12 <kstuart> has joined #xwiki  
10:25 <vmassol> sburjan: would be great to document the AS cleanup feature on http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Activity+Stream+Plugin (maybe with a link to this on http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Activity+Macro )  
10:26 <sburjan> ok, I'll do it today  
10:26 <sburjan> ping you when I'm done so youcan review it  
10:26 <vmassol> thanks  
10:36 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
11:11 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
11:48 <polx> has quit  
11:50 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
12:15 <sburjan> vmassol: are you sure I should document it on  http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Activity+Stream+Plugin ? it says that "Now replaced by the newer Event Stream Module."  
12:27 <msmeria> has quit  
12:27 <vmassol> sburjan: cehcking  
12:28 <vmassol> AFAICS that mention is wrong  
12:28 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
12:28 <vmassol> precisely:  
12:28 <vmassol> "    Store and query events from the wiki. At the moment this is only an API which replaces the older ActivityStream API.  
12:28 <vmassol> fixing  
12:29 <vmassol> sburjan: fixed  
12:29 <vmassol> so yes it's the right place :)  
12:30 <sburjan> thanks vmassol .  
12:32 <vmassol> going out for lunch, bbl  
12:53 <polx> has quit  
14:13 <polx> has joined #xwiki  
14:15 <sburjan> vmassol: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Activity+Stream+Plugin#HCleaninguptheActicityStream  
14:27 <vmassol> thanks sburjan  
14:30 <sburjan> np, I hope it's good  
14:35 <vmassol> yes it's fine thanks  
15:29 <msmeria> has quit  
16:13 <Mariah> has joined #xwiki  
16:17 <polx\_> has joined #xwiki  
16:18 <Mariah> hello  
16:18 <Mariah> xwiki have something like a social network?  
16:19 <gdelhumeau> you can send messages through the activity stream  
16:19 <gdelhumeau> but it's not really like a social network ;)  
16:20 <polx> has quit  
16:20 <polx\_> is now known as <polx>  
16:22 <Mariah> thnx gdelhumeau  
16:25 <vmassol> Mariah: you can also follow users and see their activity  
16:25 <vmassol> (follower/following)  
16:32 <evalica> has quit  
16:34 <Mariah> ok thnx vmassol!  
16:48 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki
